content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":1,"originalJapaneseLine":"「エロヤックちゃん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Erotic Yak-chan...\""},{"lineNumber":2,"originalJapaneseLine":"　名残惜しいれすが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's regrettable, but...\""},{"lineNumber":3,"originalJapaneseLine":"「キニシナイデ　アテナサン。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't worry about it, Athena-san."},{"lineNumber":4,"originalJapaneseLine":"　オシゴト　ダイジ　ユウセンシテ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Work is important, so prioritize it.\""},{"lineNumber":5,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐすっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sniff...\""},{"lineNumber":6,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ソレデハ　ミナサン","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, everyone,"},{"lineNumber":7,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サヨナラサンカク　マタキテシカク。","translatedEnglishLine":"Goodbye triangle, come again square."},{"lineNumber":8,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ワタシ　イツモ　ココデ　ピルピルマツ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll always be here, waiting with a twitch.\""},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達はエロヤックと別れて","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others parted ways with Erotic Yak,"},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"更に先へと進んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"and proceeded further ahead."},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人間の出来てる立派な方でしたね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She was a splendid person with great humanity, wasn't she?\""},{"lineNumber":12,"originalJapaneseLine":"「機械だけどな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Though she's a machine.\""},{"lineNumber":13,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あのぅ、ランス様、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, Lord Lance,"},{"lineNumber":14,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そろそろどうしてこちらに来たのか、","translatedEnglishLine":"could you tell me why you came here soon?"},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"　教えて頂いてもいいでしょうか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Would that be alright?\""},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふん、まあ良かろう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, well, very well then...\""},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"昨晩――","translatedEnglishLine":"Last night—"},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"スケールの街、ランスの部屋――","translatedEnglishLine":"In the city of Scale, Lance's room—"},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、来たな、サチコ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, you came, Sachiko.\""},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーい、来ましたよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Here I am.\""},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、なんだその本は？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, what's that book?\""},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え？　ランスさんがドラゴンパッチについて","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Lance-san said he wanted to learn about Dragon Patch,"},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"　聞きたいというので全巻持ってきたんですが」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I brought all volumes with me.\""},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"「個人的には四巻がとってもお勧めですよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Personally, volume 4 comes highly recommended!"},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"　政治的な駆け引きが生まれて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Political intrigue arises,"},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"　作品に深みが――」","translatedEnglishLine":"which adds depth to the work—\""},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そういう説明はいらん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't need that explanation.\""},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え？　読まないんですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh? You're not going to read it?\""},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"「読まん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I won't read it."},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな文字だけの本、面白いわけがない」","translatedEnglishLine":"A book with nothing but text can't be interesting.\""},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えー……とっても面白いのに……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehh... it's really interesting though..."},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全巻お勧めなのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I recommend all volumes...\""},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんなのどこがいいんだか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't see what's good about this...\""},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すっごくいいんです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's really good."},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とても面白いんです」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's very interesting.\""},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当にもう、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Truly,"},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最終巻が出ないのが辛くて辛くて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"it's so painful that the final volume doesn't come out...\""},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その最終巻、ハウゼルも欲しがるだろうか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I wonder if Howzel would want that final volume too?\""},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もちろんですよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course!"},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ファンなら誰でも、命を差し出しても","translatedEnglishLine":"Any fan would want it even if they had to give their life for it."},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"　欲しくなるに決まってます！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a given!\""},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう、命を差し出しても……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? Even if they had to give their life..."},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"ね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"「というわけでここに来たのだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So that's why we came here.\""},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……すまんが、分からん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Sorry, but I don't understand.\""},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どういうことでしょう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What do you mean?\""},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クレインちゃん、説明」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kurein-chan, explain.\""},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ドラゴンパッチを書いたという作者が、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The author who wrote Dragon Patch,"},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"　執筆活動の為に、今ここにい、る」","translatedEnglishLine":"is currently here doing writing work.\""},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"「という情報が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's the information we have...\""},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その通り。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Exactly."},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"　作者は今ハイパービル内で","translatedEnglishLine":"The author is now somewhere inside Hyper Building,"},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"　行方知れずとかなんとか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and is missing or something...\""},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんとしてもそいつを見つけ出して、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We absolutely must find that person,"},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"　続きを書かせる」","translatedEnglishLine":"and make them write the continuation.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「キニシナイデ　アテナサン。
オシゴト　ダイジ　ユウセンシテ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Work is important, so prioritize it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サヨナラサンカク　マタキテシカク。
ワタシ　イツモ　ココデ　ピルピルマツ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll always be here, waiting with a twitch."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はエロヤックと別れて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others parted ways with Erotic Yak,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間の出来てる立派な方でしたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She was a splendid person with great humanity, wasn't she?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろどうしてこちらに来たのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: could you tell me why you came here soon?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 教えて頂いてもいいでしょうか？」
スケールの街、ランスの部屋――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the city of Scale, Lance's room—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え？　ランスさんがドラゴンパッチについて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Lance-san said he wanted to learn about Dragon Patch,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞きたいというので全巻持ってきたんですが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I brought all volumes with me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「個人的には四巻がとってもお勧めですよ！
政治的な駆け引きが生まれて、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which adds depth to the work—"
"Eh? You're not going to read it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな文字だけの本、面白いわけがない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A book with nothing but text can't be interesting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんなのどこがいいんだか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't see what's good about this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最終巻が出ないのが辛くて辛くて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's so painful that the final volume doesn't come out..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その最終巻、ハウゼルも欲しがるだろうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wonder if Howzel would want that final volume too?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ファンなら誰でも、命を差し出しても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Any fan would want it even if they had to give their life for it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 欲しくなるに決まってます！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? Even if they had to give their life...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけでここに来たのだ」
「ドラゴンパッチを書いたという作者が、
執筆活動の為に、今ここにい、る」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is currently here doing writing work."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作者は今ハイパービル内で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The author is now somewhere inside Hyper Building,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行方知れずとかなんとか……」
「なんとしてもそいつを見つけ出して、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and make them write the continuation."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「キニシナイデ　アテナサン。
オシゴト　ダイジ　ユウセンシテ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Work is important, so prioritize it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サヨナラサンカク　マタキテシカク。
ワタシ　イツモ　ココデ　ピルピルマツ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll always be here, waiting with a twitch."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はエロヤックと別れて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others parted ways with Erotic Yak,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間の出来てる立派な方でしたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She was a splendid person with great humanity, wasn't she?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろどうしてこちらに来たのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: could you tell me why you came here soon?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 教えて頂いてもいいでしょうか？」
スケールの街、ランスの部屋――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the city of Scale, Lance's room—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え？　ランスさんがドラゴンパッチについて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Lance-san said he wanted to learn about Dragon Patch,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞きたいというので全巻持ってきたんですが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I brought all volumes with me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「個人的には四巻がとってもお勧めですよ！
政治的な駆け引きが生まれて、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which adds depth to the work—"
"Eh? You're not going to read it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな文字だけの本、面白いわけがない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A book with nothing but text can't be interesting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんなのどこがいいんだか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't see what's good about this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最終巻が出ないのが辛くて辛くて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's so painful that the final volume doesn't come out..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その最終巻、ハウゼルも欲しがるだろうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wonder if Howzel would want that final volume too?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ファンなら誰でも、命を差し出しても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Any fan would want it even if they had to give their life for it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 欲しくなるに決まってます！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? Even if they had to give their life...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけでここに来たのだ」
「ドラゴンパッチを書いたという作者が、
執筆活動の為に、今ここにい、る」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is currently here doing writing work."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作者は今ハイパービル内で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The author is now somewhere inside Hyper Building,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行方知れずとかなんとか……」
「なんとしてもそいつを見つけ出して、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and make them write the continuation."
